title: Tested: Logitech’s new Lift vertical mouse for Mac makes all the right compromises
content:
Earlier in the month, Logitech launched its with the debut of its new Lift verticle mouse. Now after putting it to the test over the past week, our latest Tested with 9to5Toys review is diving in to see if the more affordable ergonomic focus of the vertical mouse is worth a spot on your desk.

more…

The post Tested: Logitech’s new Lift vertical mouse for Mac makes all the right compromises appeared first on 9to5Mac.
description: The new Logitech Lift delivers an even more affordable vertical mouse option for those who want added ergonomics on a tighter budget.
